name: openapi-boilerplate
description: Multi-file boilerplate for Open API Specification.

scripts.test: npm run build && spectral lint swagger.yaml
scripts.preview: npm run build && redoc-cli serve swagger.yaml --options.onlyRequiredInSamples
scripts.html: npm run build && redoc-cli bundle swagger.yaml --output index.html --options.onlyRequiredInSamples
